ar: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
en: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast
And the earth and the mountains are lifted
and leveled with one blow [i.e., stroke] -
Then on that Day, the Occurrence [i.e., Resurrection] will occur,
And the heaven will split [open],
for that Day it is infirm.
And the angels are at its edges.
And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day,
eight [of them].
That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement];
That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement];
not hidden among you is anything concealed.
So as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
he will say,
he will say,
"Here, read my record!
Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
So he will be in a pleasant life -
In an elevated garden,
Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
[They will be told], "Eat and drink

ar: هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
en: in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."
